ModMetaData.name: AutopsyTable (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: bodlosh
ModMetaData.description:
Update of bodloshs mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1495723533
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/AutopsyTable
--- Original Description --- Remove organs and bionics from corpses. Factors that influence the success chance: - doctor skill of the worker - corpse age (after 24 hours it is almost impossible to succeed) - room surgery success chance and infection chance - quality and material of the table (silver!)
